# Introduction

The `linreg` package provides a simple implementation of linear regression using QR decomposition. In this vignette, we will walk through an example of how to use the `linreg` function and the associated methods.

# Example

Let's start by fitting a linear regression model using the well-known `iris` dataset.

```{r}
# Load the necessary package
library(linearmod)

# Fit a linear regression model
linreg_mod <- linreg(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Width + Sepal.Length, data = iris)

plot(linreg_mod)

pred(linreg_mod)


# View the summary
summary(linreg_mod)
